description: bust length portrait; man facing slight left and looking left; wearing hat with tall crown; beard; in a oval composition; framed with wood-like oval with two horns at top and 2 paletts with brushes attached to sides; pedestal at bottom
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscriptions

in image in black: Bononiensis Lvdovicvs  Caraccivs  Pictor / Obit anno 1612 eius opera in toto feré / terrarum Orbe florent / BC  | on sheet in pencil: 2-266
title: Portrait of Ludovico Caracci
